CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hiv_enrollment ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, created_date TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, created_by VARCHAR ( 255 ), last_modified_date TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, last_modified_by VARCHAR ( 255 ), unique_id VARCHAR ( 255 ), entry_point_id BIGINT, target_group_id BIGINT, date_confirmed_hiv date, date_enrolled_pmtct date, source_of_referrer_id BIGINT, time_hiv_diagnosis date, pregnant BOOLEAN, breastfeeding BOOLEAN, date_of_registration date, status_at_registration_id BIGINT, enrollment_setting_id BIGINT, date_started date, send_message BOOLEAN, person_id BIGINT, facility_id BIGINT, visit_id BIGINT, uuid VARCHAR ( 255 ), archived INTEGER, facility_name VARCHAR ( 255 ), ovc_number VARCHAR ( 255 ), date_of_lpm date, pregnancy_status_id BIGINT, tb_status_id BIGINT, CONSTRAINT pk_hiv_enrollment PRIMARY KEY ( id ) );
ALTER TABLE hiv_enrollment ADD CONSTRAINT FK_HIV_ENROLLMENT_ON_PERSON FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES person (id);
